marklogic.body:
As long as the Left and the collaborating mainstream media keep race-baiting and attempting to pin every despicable Act involving a black and white person on race, racial divisions will only get worse. It is beginning to appear that these people WANT to keep these fires Burning for whatever despicable advantage they think it will bring to them.
It is appalling that the MSM have spent such an inordinate amount of time focusing on an isolated, but admittedly truly unfortunate incident in Florida, when so many crucial decisions are being made in Washington (Obamacare and the budget, to name just two). Enough already!!!
